H0.text: when did ibuprofen become available over the counter. 1974

H1.text: when did ibuprofen become available over the counter. 1980

H2.text: when did ibuprofen become available over the counter. 1985

H3.text: when did ibuprofen become available over the counter. 1983

A4.text: In 1983 and 1984, it became the first NSAID (other than aspirin) to be available over-the-counter (OTC) in these two countries.

A5.text: Ibuprofen was launched as a treatment for rheumatoid arthritis in the United Kingdom in 1969, and in the United States in 1974.
